meanings.sent1: The copyists at the office were busy duplicating important documents.
meanings.sent2: The copyists in the library were reproducing old manuscripts for preservation.
meanings.sent3: The copyists accidentally made a copy of a copy, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The copyists were like human printers, churning out duplicates with precision.
meanings.sent5: The diligent copyists meticulously replicated each page by hand.

meanings.definition: A person who imitates or mimics the work of others.
meanings.sent1: The young artist was known as a copyist for recreating famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: Some comedians start as copyists, mimicking the jokes of established performers.
meanings.sent3: The copyists at the party amused everyone by imitating famous celebrities.
meanings.sent4: In the art world, copyists are like echoes, repeating the strokes of masters.
meanings.sent5: The talented copyists could replicate any style with remarkable accuracy.
